bio: IT Analyst @ Capgemini | Software Engineer | React | MERN
about:
I am a computer science graduate from the BUE seeking opportunities as a Software Engineer. Proficient in JavaScript, Redux, React, HTML, CSS, MongoDB, Postgres, and Node.js/Express I possess a strong foundation in frontend development. While I don't have prior work experience, my passion for coding and continuous learning drives me to excel in the field.

Through volunteer work teaching English to children, I have demonstrated dedication and the ability to contribute to meaningful projects. I leverage my programming skills and utilize tools like chatGPT to troubleshoot and find solutions to technical challenges efficiently.

I have developed a LinkedIn clone project, showcasing my expertise in creating dynamic and responsive user interfaces. With a keen eye for design and attention to detail, I strive to deliver engaging and user-friendly experiences.

experiences.description:
- Designed and implemented a shift scheduling system, enabling employees to submit annual vacation requests efficiently. 
- Developed an automated user information documentation tool, reducing processing time by 90%.

education.educationDescription: Studied algorithms, databases, and software engineering.
